name: Spirit Escape
description:
Join little blob as they venture through the human world, dodging all sources of light on their journey to make it back home. 

Created for the Winter 2022 Centennial college game jam.

Programming by  Nathaniel Hachey - https://lordbreakerx01.itch.io

and Willem Vidler - https://toastyramenboy.itch.io/

Audio by Kelly Lin

Design by Anson Lai

and Art by me, Jenny Sherwood
